Name: Survival
About the game: This is a FPS game. Players operate a character into a game's battlefield through VR devices. Players need to find enemies and knock down enemies in the battlefield. Players can gather materials in the battlefield to make themselves stronger and live longer.
Developers: 重庆第五维科技有限公司
Publishers: 重庆第五维科技有限公司
